name: blastel battlegrounds
description:
this is a new first-person shooter where players have to dodge and shooter other players in the game. instead of the traditional system of getting shot and dying. players instead get knocked back from the bullets. with different characters with different movement skills and abilities, you can fight with up to 12 players in this epic battleground.

to get updates and notifications on the game, join the discord here

this game is in very early development, features will be slowly implemented over the span of the game, and will eventually be released on steam.

the current update is 0.0.0.1

changelog: added the main menu, with a working start and quit button.
